mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEDIA JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) WHERE ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiNameEn}
SELECT CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ARTI_NAME_EN FROM M_CATEGORY WHERE ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiNameEn}

SELECT MEDIA_NUM , MEDIA_TTL , MEDIA_CTT , MEDIA_DATE , MEDIA_STATUS , IS_PAY , MEDIA_PAY , MEDIA_COUNT , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ARTI_NAME_EN , ATT_CODE , ATT_ROOT , VID_CL_NAME , VID_SV_NAME , ATT_STATUS , PIC_CL_NAME , PIC_SV_NAME FROM MEDIA JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) JOIN MD_FILE USING(MEDIA_NUM) WHERE ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiNameEn} AND MEDIA_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEDIA_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM , MEDIA_NUM , MEDIA_TTL , MEDIA_CTT , MEDIA_DATE , MEDIA_STATUS , IS_PAY , MEDIA_PAY , MEDIA_COUNT , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ARTI_NAME_EN , ATT_CODE , ATT_ROOT , VID_CL_NAME , VID_SV_NAME , ATT_STATUS , PIC_CL_NAME , PIC_SV_NAME FROM MEDIA JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) JOIN MD_FILE USING(MEDIA_NUM) WHERE ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiNameEn} AND IS_PAY = 'N' AND MEDIA_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEDIA_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( CART_CODE , BUY_Q , B_PRICE , FEE , ENROLL_DATE , IS_BOUGHT , MEDIA_NUM , ID , BOUGHT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CART.NEXTVAL , #{buyQ} , #{buyPrice} , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{mediaNum} , #{id} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MEDIA_NUM , MEDIA_TTL , MEDIA_CTT , MEDIA_DATE , MEDIA_STATUS , IS_PAY , MEDIA_PAY , MEDIA_COUNT , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ARTI_NAME_EN , ATT_CODE , ATT_ROOT , VID_CL_NAME , VID_SV_NAME , ATT_STATUS , PIC_CL_NAME , PIC_SV_NAME FROM MEDIA JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) JOIN MD_FILE USING(MEDIA_NUM) WHERE ( MEDIA_TTL LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR MEDIA_CTT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR CATE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ) AND ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiName} AND MEDIA_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEDIA_DATE DESC

SELECT MEDIA_NUM , MEDIA_TTL , MEDIA_CTT , MEDIA_DATE , MEDIA_STATUS , IS_PAY , MEDIA_PAY , MEDIA_COUNT , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ARTI_NAME_EN , ATT_CODE , ATT_ROOT , VID_CL_NAME , VID_SV_NAME , ATT_STATUS , PIC_CL_NAME , PIC_SV_NAME FROM MEDIA JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) JOIN MD_FILE USING(MEDIA_NUM) WHERE CATE_NAME = #{category} AND ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiName} AND MEDIA_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MEDIA_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEDIA JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) WHERE CATE_NAME = #{category} AND ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiName}

SELECT MEDIA_NUM , MEDIA_TTL , MEDIA_CTT , MEDIA_DATE , MEDIA_STATUS , IS_PAY , MEDIA_PAY , MEDIA_COUNT , CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , ARTI_NAME_EN , ATT_CODE , ATT_ROOT , VID_CL_NAME , VID_SV_NAME , ATT_STATUS , PIC_CL_NAME , PIC_SV_NAME , COUNT , COUNT_DATE FROM MEDIA LEFT JOIN M_CATEGORY USING(CATE_CODE) LEFT JOIN MD_FILE USING(MEDIA_NUM) LEFT JOIN MD_COUNT USING(MEDIA_NUM) WHERE MEDIA_NUM = #{mediaNum} AND ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiName} AND MEDIA_STATUS = 'Y' AND ATT_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MD_COUNT ( COUNT , COUNT_DATE , MEDIA_NUM ) VALUES ( DEFAULT , SYSDATE , #{mediaNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEDIA SET MEDIA_COUNT = MEDIA_COUNT + 1 WHERE MEDIA_NUM = #{mediaNum}
mapper.select: SELECT BM_STATUS , BM_DATE , ID , MEDIA_NUM FROM MD_BMARK WHERE MEDIA_NUM = #{mediaNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MD_CMT WHERE MEDIA_NUM = #{mediaNum}

SELECT CMT_NUM , CMT_CTT , CMT_DATE , RPT_COUNT , CMT_STATUS , A.ID , RE_CMT_NUM , MEDIA_NUM , LIKE_COUNT , B.NICKNAME , C.U_NICKNAME , D.UP_SV_NAME , E.ATT_SV_NAME FROM MD_CMT A LEFT JOIN ART_PERSON B ON(A.ID = B.ARTI_ID) LEFT JOIN ATT_SUBSCRIBE C ON(A.ID = C.U_ID) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE D ON(A.ID = D.U_ID) LEFT JOIN ART_PIC E ON(A.ID = E.ARTI_ID) WHERE MEDIA_NUM = #{mediaNum} AND ( B.ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiName} OR C.ARTI_NAME_EN = #{artiName} ) AND ( E.ATT_STATUS = 'Y' OR D.UP_STATUS = 'Y' ) AND A.CMT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CMT_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MD_CMT ( CMT_NUM , CMT_CTT , CMT_DATE , RPT_COUNT , CMT_STATUS , ID , RE_CMT_NUM , MEDIA_NUM , LIKE_COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MD_CMT.NEXTVAL , #{rcontent} , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{writer} , NULL , #{refId} , 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE MD_CMT SET CMT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CMT_NUM = #{rid}
